record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - September 17, 2008)

[Page: H8354]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members have 5 legislative days to revise and extend their remarks on the subject of the resolution just adopted.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentlewoman from New York?
